group_1.textLeft: Is that practice for your surprise role in the@Everlasting Darkness Tour?

group_1.textRight: Um, the Mage of Darkness...@or was it the Nameless Mage?

group_1.textLeft: That's it!
It's dark and not dark, but definitely still feels dark!

group_1.textRight: Umm...so which one is it in the end...?

group_1.textLeft: Maybe what she's trying to say is that...
She's starting to be dyed dark, but not fully dyed@in darkness yet?
She's a resident of the world of@everlasting darkness,
but the story is that she doesn't want anymore@people to join her side...

group_1.textRight: Ah, I see...@So you're like a helpful character.

group_1.textLeft: That's right...@Yesterday, Karin was like...

group_1.textCenter: I want you energetic and cheerful, but that alone@isn't enough!
I also want you to be aware that you're a resident@of eternal darkness!

group_1.textLeft: That's what she told me.
She wants me to put more attention on the@Dark Mito part, you see.

group_1.textRight: Dark Mito...I kind of like the sound of that.

group_1.textLeft: REALLY?! It's darkish to you?

group_1.textRight: Either way it's kinda cute sounding,@don't you think...?

group_1.textLeft: Oh...

Ugh, get it together...@[chara:301550:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301550:motion_200][chara:301550:eyeClose_0][chara:301550:cheek_0][chara:301550:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:301550:lipSynch_1]Let's start with facial expressions!
How's that? Feel the darkness?

group_1.textRight: Umm...I thought that was more being angry...
I felt like that was you being serious, too...@It's not really like darkness.

group_1.textLeft: Alright, next!

group_1.textRight: That feels closer to being sad than being angry now,@doesn't it...?
Though, it does feel a little different to me...

group_1.textLeft: Is it too much cheeriness?

group_1.textRight: Mmm...how do I put this... It gives the impression...@that everything will be okay...
Ahâ€” like she's going to escape the everlasting@darkness through her own power...!
That!

group_1.textLeft: Breaking through the darkness: Mito power!!
...I'm brimming with energy, huh.

group_1.textRight: That's what you're best at though, Mito...
Maybe you should try looking a bit@more inward now...
Like you're trapped in darkness.

group_1.textLeft: Got it!

group_1.textRight: Hm?

group_1.textLeft: Watch this...

group_1.textRight: ......[wait:0.8][chara:301401:lipSynch_1]Mito...?
Um...are you okay...?@What happened?

group_1.textLeft: Ehehe...@How's that? Were you scared?

group_1.textRight: Was I scared... You suddenly going silent@like that is scary...
And with the way you were smiling, I couldn't tell@where you were looking...

group_1.textLeft: I took my heart and... [chara:301550:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301550:motion_200][chara:301550:lipSynch_1]Bam!@Left it in the dark!
I've been a resident of the dark this whole time,
so I realized I don't have to express darkness!

group_1.textRight: Umm...it feels like you put up a wall@between yourself and reality...?
Ah, you're imagining not being able to leave the@darkness through your own power...?

group_1.textLeft: Right! An empty feeling.
But the truth is I'm a cheery girl, so that's why@I'm smiling!

group_1.textRight: I kind of get it, but at the same time I don't...
Yeah, I'm glad you're getting the hang of this.

group_1.textLeft: But I'm not there yet!
When I'm cheery I pop out with a "Yaah!",
so I need to sink further into darkness...
Honestly, I can't tell a difference between the@before and after, but...
Maybe she's stabilized her feel for scariness...?

group_1.textRight: Maybe she found a way...
...to sink "Cheery Mito" into darkness...?

group_1.textLeft: Yep!
I figured out how to leave Cheery Mito in the dark!
And now I'm ready for the real deal!

group_1.textRight: Then I'm happy for you!
We'll be cheering you on.
